basics.name: Albert (Geyang) Xu
basics.summary: A passionate computer scientist with experience in software engineering, research, and web development.

work.name: UCSD Halıcıoğlu Data Science Institute
work.summary: Developed and implemented a framework for specifying and injecting complex data quality issues into datasets.
highlights: Improved fairness and accuracy in machine learning models.
Executed experiments evaluating robustness of data cleaning tools.
Collaborated on the development of a declarative language for pattern specification.

work.name: UCSD ECE Department
work.summary: Developed and maintained the ITA workshop website using Django and React.
highlights: Enhanced site performance and user experience for nearly 1,000 users.
Optimized database structure to prevent data loss.

work.name: Citmit
work.summary: Developed backend services to automate the building permit application process.
highlights: Reduced permit wait times from months to hours.
Implemented secure storage using Amazon S3.

work.name: Sensing IoT Group Ltd.
work.summary: Developed a full-stack Java application for real-time sensor data collection.
highlights: Enhanced asynchronous communication using Java Spring Boot and Netty.
